hero.title: Hi!
hero.subtitle: I'm Santiago and this is my portfolio.

aboutMe.title: About me:
aboutMe.p1: I'm passionate about technology, data, and business.
aboutMe.p2: Although, when I chose a career in my 18s I decided for Marketing. Strange, right? But at that moment I saw the mathematical and theoretical aspect of engineering not aligned with what I wanted.
aboutMe.p3: That change and in the career I discovered that maths are fun when you applied in something real, like sales and costs. Anyway, I enjoyed Marketing a lot, and I think it gave me a business vision that if I studied other career would take me a lot more to develop.
aboutMe.p4: Later, I took courses of Data Analytics and Data Sciences. Which confirmed my interest in data and development, and give me the courage to made a postgrad in Quantitative Finances.

why.title: Why?
why.p1: I love this question, so I think it deserves a section in my portfolio.
why.p2: Why I love why? Because I feel that exposes my motivation in every aspect of my life.
why.p3: Why I do what I do? Because I think is cool. This may sound dorky, and I know that say cool is not cool anymore, but recently discover is the best way to explain it, at myself at least work.
why.p4: Always love technology, but at the same time had other strong interest that change at the time. Working in IT give me the same feeling as child when I discover some new and exciment topic that made me lose track of time and go all in learning more about that.
why.p5: In this path to learn new things and searching in Google or YouTube about my new passion, I see in retrospective that my only compass to guide me was 'this is cool, I wanna know more'.
why.p6: And that was all the justification that I need. That for me was 'cool'. Nowadays things does not change so much. Yes, I have more structure and develop frameworks to learn better. But what I more enjoy is working into something that I truly believe that's cool. Even though said in that way is not cool.

1.title: Finance Tracker
1.short: Web app with IA integration and shopping cart that allows users to register and manage their personal finances in a simple and intuitive way.
1.desc: This interactive dashboard was developed to visualize personal finances with an intuitive user interface.

2.title: Miel Bakery
2.short: Bakery website designed to showcase products and prices for clients.
2.desc: Bakery website designed to showcase products and prices for clients.

3.title: Diamond Studio - Manicure
3.short: Manicure website with appointment scheduling, contact form and shopping cart. Including email marketing system and customer management system.
3.desc: Manicure website with appointment scheduling and contact form. Including email marketing system and customer management system.

4.title: La Alfarera Workshop
4.short: Landing page for a pottery studio, with the target to show the services and techniques for the clients.
4.desc: Landing page for a pottery studio, with the target to show the services and techniques for the clients.
